A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Logic is sacrificed in order to push a political message. Characters from the original trilogy are portrayed as failures and act contrary to how they behaved for all three original films. Creativity is on an all time low as far as set-design\, costume design\, location and world building. Like the Force Awakens The Last Jedi borrows many beats from the original l movies but fails to tell a cohesive story.
